segments.text: I see a moment frozen in time; the woman is at the sink while the children plot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how she doesn’t even look down at the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination to climb that stool for cookies is heartwarming yet reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of anger for the lack of awareness in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the girl watches him, it’s like she’s cheering him on, completely disregarding the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake off the feeling that something terrible could happen in seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water, the children, the distracted adult—it all feels like a disaster waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
